name: G-Jumper
description:
Game created in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam #19.

Play as space explorer sended on the mission in order to obtain high energy essence, which disintegrates over time.

After writing you write a name, you have to press Enter to confirm it.

Pressing Tab leads you to the settings with a MENU button.

Tip 1: use gravity balls in direction of movement for stronger effect

Tip 2: use gravity balls after mid-air jump for stronger effect

Tip 3: use yellow ball to slow down in the air
